field.name: que_quan_quan

field.updateValue: b.dia_chi_th_tru_so + case when b.dia_chi_th_tru_so <> '' and b.dia_chi_th_tru_phuong <> '' then ' - ' else '' end + b.dia_chi_th_tru_phuong

field.updateValue: b.que_quan_so + case when b.que_quan_so <> '' and b.que_quan_phuong <> '' then ' - ' else '' end + b.que_quan_phuong

processing.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @working varchar(32), @maxID char(13), @identityCardConflict nvarchar(512) declare @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @count int, @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @currentID int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0 select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @working = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_tt_lam_viec' select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @identityCardConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã có trong thông tin nhân viên.' else '&s2; is already exists.' end -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from hrnv b where a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv) &CheckValidEmailCommandCheckingImport; -- Check if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_nv', stt, @message from @@table where ma_nv like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_nv', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_nv like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end &Checking; -- Check Identity Card Number -- + Self if @$mode = 1 begin select cmnd_so into #duplicate0 from @@table where cmnd_so <> '' group by cmnd_so having count(*) > 1 if exists(select 1 from #duplicate0) begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'cmnd_so', a.stt, 'E0001' from @@table a join #duplicate0 b on a.cmnd_so = b.cmnd_so where 1=1&w1;'cmnd_so'&w2;a.stt&w3;'E0001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end end else begin select @r = stt from (select min(stt) as stt from @@table where cmnd_so <> '' group by cmnd_so having count(*) > 1) a if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@identityCardConflict, '%s1', cmnd_so), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end select b.stt_rec, c.ma_dvcs, c.bp_ref, a.*, cast('' as nvarchar(511)) as dia_chi_ht_phuong, cast('' as nvarchar(511)) as dia_chi_th_tru_phuong, cast('' as nvarchar(511)) as que_quan_phuong into #k from @@table a join hrnv b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv join hrbp c on a.bo_phan = c.ma_bp if @type = '1' delete @@table where ma_nv in (select ma_nv from #k) update #k set dia_chi_ht_phuong = b.ten_phuong from #k a join hrdmphuong b on a.dia_chi_ht_tinh = b.ma_tinh and a.dia_chi_ht_quan = b.ma_quan and a.dia_chi_ht_xa = b.ma_phuong update #k set dia_chi_th_tru_phuong = b.ten_phuong from #k a join hrdmphuong b on a.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = b.ma_tinh and a.dia_chi_th_tru_quan = b.ma_quan and a.dia_chi_th_tru_xa = b.ma_phuong update #k set que_quan_phuong = b.ten_phuong from #k a join hrdmphuong b on a.que_quan_tinh = b.ma_tinh and a.que_quan_quan = b.ma_quan and a.que_quan_xa = b.ma_phuong -- + Inserting if @$mode = 1 begin select a.ma_nv into #duplicate1 from @@table a join hrnv b on a.cmnd_so = b.cmnd_so left join #k c on b.ma_nv = c.ma_nv where a.cmnd_so <> '' and c.ma_nv is null group by a.ma_nv if exists(select 1 from #duplicate1) begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'cmnd_so', a.stt, 'E0001' from @@table a join #duplicate1 b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv where 1=1&w1;'cmnd_so'&w2;a.stt&w3;'E0001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv b on a.cmnd_so = b.cmnd_so left join #k c on b.ma_nv = c.ma_nv where a.cmnd_so <> '' and c.ma_nv is null group by a.ma_nv if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@identityCardConflict, '%s1', cmnd_so), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- + Updating if @type = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin select a.ma_nv into #duplicate2 from #k a join hrnv b on a.cmnd_so = b.cmnd_so where a.cmnd_so <> '' and a.ma_nv <> b.ma_nv group by a.ma_nv if exists(select 1 from #duplicate2) begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'cmnd_so', a.stt, 'E0001' from #k a join #duplicate2 b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv where 1=1&w1;'cmnd_so'&w2;a.stt&w3;'E0001'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from #k a join hrnv b on a.cmnd_so = b.cmnd_so where a.cmnd_so <> '' and a.ma_nv <> b.ma_nv group by a.ma_nv if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@identityCardConflict, '%s1', cmnd_so), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from #k where stt = @r return end end end &EndErrorMode; -- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @q = 'delete @@table from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from hrbp e where a.bo_phan = e.ma_bp' + case when @key = '' then '' else ' and (' + @key + ')' end + ')' exec sp_executesql @q if @type = '1' begin select @q = 'delete @@table from @@table where ma_nv in (select ma_nv from hrnv) and ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv e' + case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end + ')' exec sp_executesql @q if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrPIGeneralInformation', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = 0 end end -- Gather select top 0 ma_dvcs, bp_ref, ma_nv, ho_nv, ten_nv, bo_phan, gioi_tinh, ngay_vao, ngay_chinh_thuc, ngay_sinh, noi_sinh, ma_loai_gt, cmnd_so, cmnd_noi_cap, cmnd_ngay_hl, cmnd_ngay_hh, quoc_tich, dan_toc, ton_giao, hon_nhan, dien_thoai_dd, email_cty, dia_chi_ht_so, dia_chi_ht_phuong, dia_chi_ht_quan, dia_chi_ht_tinh, vi_tri, bac_quan_ly, nv_ql, ma_tdhv, truong_hoc, ma_cn, ngay_hoc_tu, ngay_hoc_den, ngay_tot_nghiep, loai_tot_nghiep, ma_nn, bang_cap, diem, ngay_cap_bang, dien_thoai_cty, dien_thoai_nha, email_ca_nhan, giam_ho, nguoi_than, dia_chi_th_tru_so, dia_chi_th_tru_phuong, dia_chi_th_tru_quan, dia_chi_th_tru_tinh, que_quan_so, que_quan_phuong, que_quan_quan, que_quan_tinh, nh_nv1, nh_nv2, nh_nv3, cast(0 as int) as stt, dia_chi_ht_xa, dia_chi_th_tru_xa, que_quan_xa into #r from hrnv insert into #r select b.ma_dvcs, b.bp_ref, a.ma_nv, a.ho_nv, a.ten_nv, a.bo_phan, a.gioi_tinh, a.ngay_vao, a.ngay_chinh_thuc, a.ngay_sinh, a.noi_sinh, a.ma_loai_gt, a.cmnd_so, a.cmnd_noi_cap, a.cmnd_ngay_hl, a.cmnd_ngay_hh, a.quoc_tich, a.dan_toc, a.ton_giao, a.hon_nhan, a.dien_thoai_dd, a.email_cty, a.dia_chi_ht_so, c.ten_phuong as dia_chi_ht_phuong, a.dia_chi_ht_quan, a.dia_chi_ht_tinh, a.vi_tri, a.bac_quan_ly, a.nv_ql, a.ma_tdhv, a.truong_hoc, a.ma_cn, a.ngay_hoc_tu, a.ngay_hoc_den, a.ngay_tot_nghiep, a.loai_tot_nghiep, a.ma_nn, a.bang_cap, a.diem, a.ngay_cap_bang, a.dien_thoai_cty, a.dien_thoai_nha, a.email_ca_nhan, a.giam_ho, a.nguoi_than, a.dia_chi_th_tru_so, d.ten_phuong as dia_chi_th_tru_phuong, a.dia_chi_th_tru_quan, a.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh, a.que_quan_so, e.ten_phuong as que_quan_phuong, a.que_quan_quan, a.que_quan_tinh, a.nh_nv1, a.nh_nv2, a.nh_nv3, a.stt, a.dia_chi_ht_xa, a.dia_chi_th_tru_xa, a.que_quan_xa from @@table a join hrbp b on a.bo_phan = b.ma_bp left join hrdmphuong c on a.dia_chi_ht_tinh = c.ma_tinh and a.dia_chi_ht_quan = c.ma_quan and a.dia_chi_ht_xa = c.ma_phuong left join hrdmphuong d on a.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = d.ma_tinh and a.dia_chi_th_tru_quan = d.ma_quan and a.dia_chi_th_tru_xa = d.ma_phuong left join hrdmphuong e on a.que_quan_tinh = e.ma_tinh and a.que_quan_quan = e.ma_quan and a.que_quan_xa = e.ma_phuong -- Insert select @count = count(*) from #r if @count > 0 begin select @maxID = max(stt_rec) from hrnv select @currentID = case when @maxID is null then 1 else cast(substring(@maxID, 2, 9) as int) end &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' begin &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; update #k set bo_phan = b.bo_phan, bp_ref = b.bp_ref, vi_tri = b.vi_tri, bac_quan_ly = b.bac_quan_ly, nv_ql = b.nv_ql from #k a join hrnv b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join hreqtlvht c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec update hrnv set @@list from hrnv a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec if exists (select 1 from options where name = 'd_001' and val = '1') begin update dvhrnv set status = '3' from dvhrnv a join #k b on a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec delete dvxlduyet where stt_rec in (select a.stt_rec from dvhrnv a join #k b on a.stt_rec_nv = b.stt_rec) end end
